extendedInfo.description: Have you ever forgot to wish happy birthday to your loved ones? Are you tired of thinking to yourself âI have to send that important email tomorrow morningâ, and then forget all about it? Do you constantly say âLetâs have a drink, Iâll text you when I leave workâ, and then find yourself alone at home because you never sent the message?Never again, with Schedalls!Schedalls is an application that allows you to schedule the way you communicate, so that youâll never forget to send that important message.ââââââââââââââââââââIMPORTANT:* This application DOES NOT WORK properly if installed on the external storage card. If you're experiencing failed messages or disappearing schedules please move it to the internal phone memory.* Remember that WE CAN'T ANSWER COMMENTS. If you have a problem or want to suggest a feature, please send us an email. We try to answer every email we receive and we'll be happy to hear from you :)* Please consider to exclude this app from Task Killers.ââââââââââââââââââââWe have been taking into consideration the suggestions you have left on the comments. The features we're currently working on are:  * Final improvements on the Email plugin  * Configure and schedule messages for groups  * TranslationsThe features already implemented in Schedalls are and always will be free of charge. For some of the new features we're working on (namely the plugins) we may ask you to pay us a beer (alcohol is a requirement for improving our programming skills). ââââââââââââââââââââKeywords: scheduler, sms scheduler, email scheduler, facebook scheduler, twitter schedulerââââââââââââââââââââ

reviews.title: works well, google calendar is good for reminding
reviews.comment: works well, google calendar is good for reminding me, this app is great for reminding everyone else. Am / Pm are not shown in selection dialog (wheels), only in the  result resulting time..  Very frustrating for most people in north american  NOT in the militarty...this has been this way for way too long... delvelopers email and website are unreachable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most reliable mass text app so far.
reviews.comment: This is the only  mass text app (not to mention that it schedules well) that I\'ve had reach all my contacts. A group add would be useful. Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Costs you money by sending out hundreds of message
reviews.comment: Sooner or later this app will crash and reset it\'s \"sent\" flags. It happened to me a fortnight ago and sent every message I had every scheduled multiple times to everyone - costing me money and making me look like an idiot.  * Messages I did not want people to know I had scheduled. * Inappropriate greeting messages. * Business contact messages. * Messages to ex girlfriends etc.  I emailed the maker and they said they\'d never heard of the problem, yet looking through the reviews here shows that it is a consistent problem. So the developers have lied and covered it up.  They have not got back to me after my initial email, in spite of repeated attempts.  Find another schedule app, as this one is a ticking time bomb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great way to schedule \"future\" SMSes
reviews.comment: I always use it to schedule SMSes that I want to send in the \"future\". Next improvement, schedule Whatsapp messages?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bella applicazione nella teoria ma...
reviews.comment: inspiegabilmente quando programmi l\'invio di 2 sms, uno resta in \"appeso\"; ultimamente, poi, molti sms restano \"in attesa di essere inviati\" senza nessuna ragione plausibile, nonostante copertura di rete massima.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Make it free
reviews.comment: Have to pay for FB, email and twitter not available. There are other better apps for free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: retry failed plugins button?
reviews.comment: Miss the one click retry failed plugins button under menu, where did it go? Opening up every text to make sure it sent (because the icons look the same) seems redundant. Also does not allow me to scroll down, have to tip my phone to side in order to set sending date and time. Galaxy S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Defective
reviews.comment: Scheduled events delete themselves. Seems to be a common issue that the Dev has no interest in accepting. UNINSTALLING.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sends duplicate texts!
reviews.comment: Was always a great app but recently started sending the same msg like 6 times! Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting error
reviews.comment: Getting generic error any idea please reply asap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well but drains battery
reviews.comment: Never had a problem with the dependability of this app. However, it does hit my battery pretty hard, usually above 20% of battery drain comes from this app, even when nothing is scheduled. Emailed developer; no response. - samsung galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost awesome.
reviews.comment: It\'s only missing the \"repeat every X days\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Multiple Sends
reviews.comment: It sends the message 6 times sometimes. Very buggy and needs to be fixed asap or it shall be deleted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Only scheduler I found that does everything I want without using handcent out gosms. Just wish the notification was audible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Good idea, not a great interface. Disabling sent notification does not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME APP!!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve got a shocking memory, but this way I can schedule my SMS\'s when I think of them. AWESOME!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Muy buena aplicacion, solo le falta mensajes de voz.pero funciona de maravilla
reviews.author: Alejandro Teniente

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Works flawless. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: This app is a lifesaver. I have the facebook add on and use sms and facebook to sent those socially expected birthay and holiday messages, as well as those \'Don\'t let me forget\' reminders. I just wish it worked with email (primarily corporate sync), Twitter, and Google+.
reviews.author: A Google User
